body.name: GAP babyGap Tate 4-in-1 Convertible Crib - Greenguard Gold Certified, Bianca White/Natural
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 6 hrs 21 mins
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Crib converts to a toddler bed, daybed and sofa (Toddler Guardrail #W173726 sold separately) | Available in Bianca White/Natural, Navy/Natural and Ebony/Natural

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: This Convertible Crib meets stringent chemical emissions standards to create a healthier home for your child. Tested for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs, this crib is certified to contribute to cleaner indoor air

ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Adjustable height mattress support with 3 convenient positions to grow with your baby | ACCESS RAIL DIMENSIONS: From Floor: 34"; From Top Mattress Support Position: 16.50"; From Bottom Mattress Support Position: 26.50"

COORDINATING ITEMS: Pair with other items in the Baby Gap collection for the perfect baby nursery | Uses a standard size crib mattress (sold separately) | To ensure the perfect fit pair your crib with a Baby Gap, Serta, Beautyrest or Simmons Kids crib mattress
SAFE FOR BABY: JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM | Made of sustainable woods like New Zealand pine & poplar | Assembled dimensions: 54.25"W x 30.75"D x 34"H
body.description: The babyGap Tate 4-in-1 Convertible Crib is a modern crib with natural accents on the base and corner posts. Crafted of sturdy, sustainable materials like New Zealand pine, this crib is the best choice for babies (and the planet!). Thoughtfully made to grow with your little one, the crib’s adjustable mattress support allows you to lower the mattress height as your baby grows. When your child is ready, its versatile design easily adapts from crib to a cozy toddler bed, daybed and sofa (conversion rail #W173726 sold separately). Plus, it’s GREENGUARD Gold Certified, which means it’s built to contribute to cleaner air for a healthy home. Available in Bianca White/Natural, Navy/Natural and Ebony/Natural. Easily mix, match, and layer with other items from the babyGap Furniture and Bedding Collection.Gap’s first-ever baby furniture collection reimagines timeless American style for modern nurseries and kids’ bedrooms. Discover quality designs and go-to essentials that instantly refresh your child’s space. Think super-soft organic bedding, elevated crib designs, and more inspired finds for daily life with your little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern and Durable Crib
reviews.reviewText: I have always been a fan of Baby Gap so when I saw they had a crib line I had to order. This crib is super durable, easy to put together, and stylish. I was able to assemble it by myself and it came with all the tools you needed to do so. The two tone looks gives it a modern feel, and really makes the navy blue pop. It also converts to a toddler bed so I’ll be ordering the toddler rail to go with it soon. It looks really high end at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Has a nice modern look to it! It’s not too tall so it’s easy to transfer baby into! Its an easy build. Me and my husband built it in under 30 minutes!! It’s very spacious and grows with your baby. I love it so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed by Quality
reviews.reviewText: I’ve built a lot of things in the past and I have to say, this crib came with the best screwdriver wrench. The set up was extremely straightforward and I can tell the wood is high quality. I didn’t know what to expect but having gone through a few cribs in the past, this one has exceeded my expectations. Great quality, amazing price, and so sleek & modern!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, sturdy, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: We love the Delta brand and have used them for all 3 of our babies. I love that they collaborated with Gap. Another brand favorite. This crib looks so clean and modern and perfect for any nursery theme. It is built sturdy and was super easy to assemble. It took my husband 30 minutes IF that. Highly highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Crib with modern style
reviews.reviewText: To pick a crib, I did a complete search in Amazon with both jpma and greenguard gold labels, and then went thru all comments and eliminated ones contains smell issues in reviews. Strangely an unexpected pattern is showed up: typically cribs from China has a likelihood of smell issues. I did have my favorites among them and one of them was this BabyGap model. So nearly I was gonna eliminate this due to origin however due to current discount decided to go for it and pleasantly surprised that smell is very low as expected from a new furniture and went away in couple of days. Very easy to install and we love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for grand babies! Slim lined, not bulky in taking up space. Quality, easy to put together. Use in our guest bedroom, along with a queen sized bed in the space. Grandson slept like an angel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought the set for my baby’s nursery. However the smell is so strong it made the whole room smell like chemicals. It made all of his clothes smell terrible. It doesn’t seem safe although it specifically said it was made differently to ensure there was not any noxious gases. I purchased the set in July and it’s now November and it hasn’t gotten better. I missed the return window and I don’t know what to do. Please help!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my house for our grandson who we are sitting full time . It’s very well made and looks great 😊
